cpl.name: check website
cpl.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/check-website
cpl.description: Check website availability or downtime and display status as a badge.
cpl.readme:
`<$check-website url="https://tiddlywiki.com/" />` will Check TiddlyWiki official site every hour.

A beautiful badge will show, act as a clickable link to the website.
